Research

Outreach

K-12 Visiting Days at Caltech. We sometimes participate in Science Cafes, e.g. Eric Klavins at Queen Anne’s, and BioCurious events. Collaboration with artist Ann Erpino including a Book about the Erpino paintings in progress

Knowledge Transfer

Annual MPP workshop retreats: 2009, 2010… Molecular Programming “Boot Camp” Summer School: planned for 2011 Biomolecular Feedback Systems: Book manuscript

Education

MPP-related curriculum development Caltech BE/CS 191 “Biomolecular Computation” Crash Course on Systems Biology (ARL supported, included MPP participants) IST 4 - Information and Logic (Bruck, Caltech)
